notes.text: sap.ui.table.*: Row actions feature added
sap.ui.table.Column: New property minWidth
sap.ui.table.Table - Ctrl+Up/Ctrl+Down keyboard navigation in cell edit mode
v2.ODataTreeBinding - Hierarchy-Maintenance - Part 2 (service-calls)
ClientTreeBindingAdapter: Build tree for selection changes
TreeBindingAdapter: SelectAll
sap.m.Link / sap.m.Text: Bold style in AnalyticalTable summary row
sap.ui.table.*: Accessibility - Improve labeling in multi header case
sap.ui.table.*: Always update the top position of the vertical scrollbar after rendering.
sap.ui.table.*: Apply padding for touch group header menu button only for non-desktop devices
sap.ui.table.*: Aria-labelledby association of cell controls to column headers added
sap.ui.table.*: Avoid exception when opening the cell context menu
sap.ui.table.*: Do not fire CellClick / Do not select on click of interactive cell content
sap.ui.table.*: Exception while column reordering when dummy column exists
sap.ui.table.*: Fix content height when custom row height is defined
sap.ui.table.*: Fix row content flash on vertical scrolling.
sap.ui.table.*: Fix tooltip of select all button
sap.ui.table.*: Fix wrong determination of the size of a table element due to IE specific behaviour.
sap.ui.table.*: Focus visualization of table cells
sap.ui.table.*: Handle Cell click also when MatrixLayout is used in cell
sap.ui.table.*: Hide selection tooltip on row header of empty rows
sap.ui.table.*: Keyboard Support: Fire cellClick event before selection
sap.ui.table.*: Parameter 'width' of Column Resize Event should have unit
sap.ui.table.*: Position Resize Bar initially out of visible area
sap.ui.table.*: Restore focus on row (e.g. tree icon) after rendering
sap.ui.table.*: Screenreader announcement of column header menu
sap.ui.table.*: Smaller fixes
sap.ui.table.*: Workaround sub-pixel problems when zooming is not 100% in Chrome
sap.ui.table.*: fixes that bindRows was not called when table was bound via XML view
sap.ui.table.AnalyticalTable: Group Header Menu Buttons should only appear on tablets/phones
sap.ui.table.Table with VisibleRowCountMode.Auto: incorrect number of rows
sap.ui.table.Table: Fix setFirstVisibleRowCount
sap.ui.table.Table: Horizontal scroll position is restored after rerendering.
sap.ui.table.Table: Ignore the additional empty row at the end in the vertical scrolling feature.
sap.ui.table.Table: Mousewheel scrolling
sap.ui.table.Table: The resize handler is registered in a promise instead of a timeout.
sap.ui.table.Table: context menu for a column header with span has incorrect position
sap.ui.table.Table: exception "Cannot read property '_onTableResize' of undefined"
sap.ui.table.Table: incorrect column width by hidden column headers
sap.ui.table.Table: incorrect horizontal scroll position in RTL mode
sap.ui.table.Table: minimal column width is not taken into account
sap.ui.table.Table: resize bar not visible in RTL mode
sap.ui.table.Table: scrollLeft is reset after vertical resize
sap.ui.table.Table: uncorrect column header widths
sap.ui.table.Table: unresponsive scroll bars in IE11
sap.ui.table.TableACCExtension: Various fixes
sap.ui.table.TreeTable/AnalyticalTable: Clear select all state before execute selectAll command
sap.ui.table.TreeTable: Fix Row selection in SelectionMode "Single" and "None".
sap.ui.table.TreeTable: Screenreader Announcement of tree icon
sap.ui.table.TreeTable: fixes toggleOpenState event for leaves
TreeBindingAdapter: Clear selectAllMode from all nodes on clearSelection()
TreeTable: Property expandFirstLevel deprecated
sap.ui.table.*: Avoid focus outline issues in Internet Explorer
sap.ui.table.*: Avoid no data visualization during refresh
sap.ui.table.*: Fix positioning of table content in IE/Edge in case of row actions
sap.ui.table.*: Fix positioning of table content with row actions (no scrollbar case)
sap.ui.table.*: Scrolling to the last row when zoomed in/out in Chrome.
sap.ui.table.*: Skip cellClick event in case of text selection
sap.ui.table.*: Tabbing in action mode when invisible columns exist.
sap.ui.table.Table: columns with minWidth disappear after window resize
TreeBindingAdapter: Harmonize selection behavior when expanding nodes using setNumberOfExpandedLevels()
AnalyticalTable: Ungrouping using the column menu
AnalyticalTable: Ungrouping in SmartTable via ViewSettings dialog
Table: Issues with zooming in Chrome
Table: Navigation while the busy indicator is shown
Table: Resizing in interactive mode on touch devices
sap.ui.table.*: Avoid error when cell control does not provide an accessibility info.
sap.ui.table.*: Avoid error while reorder columns via D&D
sap.ui.table.*: Fix scrollbar alignment on touch enabled laptops (combi devices)
Table: Prevent scrolling and a second request on a binding refresh
TreeTable: Remove leaf icons from the tab chain in edit mode
sap.ui.table.*: Suppress select all on empty table
sap.ui.table.Table - CSS corrections for column headers
sap.ui.table.Table - column header spans in XLM views
sap.ui.table.Table - row selection column is too wide in IE/Edge
sap.ui.table.Table - sort and filter icons in IE

Table: Avoid null pointer exception when last row was removed
sap.ui.table.*: Ensure visibility of scrollbars in IE on Win 10
Table: Select text of input fields in edit mode navigation
sap.ui.table.Table - infinite rerendering
sap.ui.table.Table: rendering issue with invisible fixed columns
Table: Management of the column template clone stack

Table: Correctly initialize the keyboard navigation
